title: Pan Pacific Sonargaon
address: 107 Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Dhaka - 1215, Bangladesh
description:
Pan Pacific Sonargaon is one of the most iconic and luxurious hotels in Dhaka, offering a perfect blend of modern amenities and traditional Bangladeshi hospitality. Located in the heart of the city, the hotel provides easy access to major business hubs, shopping centers, and tourist attractions. It is a preferred choice for business travelers, diplomats, and tourists seeking a luxurious stay in the capital.

The hotel features elegantly designed rooms and suites, each equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to ensure maximum comfort. Guests can enjoy a variety of dining options, including international cuisines at the on-site restaurants. The hotel also boasts a fitness center, swimming pool, spa, and business facilities, making it an ideal destination for both leisure and business travelers.

Pan Pacific Sonargaon is renowned for its exceptional service and attention to detail. Whether you're attending a business meeting, hosting an event, or simply relaxing, the hotel ensures a memorable and comfortable experience for every guest.
